sentences.en: A tragic accident shattered her dreams of Olympic glory.
sentences.cn: 一场不幸的意外事故使她获得奥运奖牌的梦想破灭了。

sentences.en: But China's Me generation could shatter such long - held assumptions.
sentences.cn: 但是,中国的 “ 我一代”可能打破这种长久以来的假设.

sentences.en: He could shatter airs and " respectability " with deadly sarcasm.
sentences.cn: 他能以无情的讽刺来粉碎派头和 “ 体面 ”.

sentences.en: How can you take my dream in life and just shatter it to pieces?
sentences.cn: 你怎么能把我这辈子的梦想撕成碎片?

sentences.en: I'll shatter memory's vessel, scattering the last the drop of tears.
sentences.cn: 我打碎记忆的瓶壶, 挥洒最后的眼泪.

sentences.en: It threatens to shatter the lives of millions of our people.
sentences.cn: 它有可能使我国千百万人民的生活无法维持.

sentences.en: On request a shatter protection element can be integrated in the underbody.

sentences.en: She was tactful enough not to shatter his illusion.
sentences.cn: 她足够机智,不至于去打破他的幻想.

sentences.en: Such words simply shatter themselves on the hard fact.
sentences.cn: 这种言论在铁的事实面前碰得粉碎.

sentences.en: That is why I at myself and shatter my secret in jest.
sentences.cn: 因此我嘲笑我自己,把我的秘密在玩笑中打碎.

sentences.en: The blast may deflect structural steel frames, collapse roofs, dish - in walls, shatter panels, and break windows.
sentences.cn: 爆震可能使结构物的钢架变形, 屋顶倒塌墙壁内陷, 墙板破碎, 窗户玻璃破碎等.
这次爆炸把大楼炸成一片废墟。

sentences.en: The words lashed against Chueh - hui's brain till he thought it would shatter.
sentences.cn: 这些字像许多根皮鞭接连地打着 觉慧 的头,他觉得他的头快要破碎了.

sentences.en: To shatter the picture in which of that as they paint me.
sentences.cn: 我要粉碎我在他们眼中的的形象.

sentences.en: To shatter this kind of forage depends mainly on cutting and rubbing.
sentences.cn: 粉碎这类粗饲料应以剪切和搓擦为主.

sentences.en: Waves lash at the Church but do not shatter it.
sentences.cn: 巨浪只能冲击教会,却不能粉碎她.

sentences.en: When dropped, malleable glass would bend rather than shatter into bits.
sentences.cn: 韧性玻璃掉在地上后, 只会折弯而不会打碎.
